LanguageData.Make_EngineAssemble_Light.label: assemble light engine
LanguageData.Make_EngineAssemble_Light.description: assemble a light engine, which is common used by motor boat, motorcycle and light aircraft.
LanguageData.Make_EngineAssemble_Steam.label: assemble steam engine
LanguageData.Make_EngineAssemble_Steam.description: assemble a steam engine, which is common used by early industrial vehicles such as steam boat and steam tractor.
LanguageData.Make_EngineAssemble_Medium.label: assemble medium engine
LanguageData.Make_EngineAssemble_Medium.description: assemble a medium engine, which is common used by tank, truck and heavy aircraft.
LanguageData.Make_EngineAssemble_Heavy.label: assemble heavy engine
LanguageData.Make_EngineAssemble_Heavy.description: assemble a heavy engine, which is common used by heavy tank and transport aircraft.
LanguageData.Make_EngineAssemble_TurboJet.label: assemble turbojet
LanguageData.Make_EngineAssemble_TurboJet.description: assemble a turbojet, an airbreathing jet engine which is typically used in aircraft and cruise missile, consists of a gas turbine with a propelling nozzle.
LanguageData.Make_EngineAssemble_Turbine.label: assemble turbine engine
LanguageData.Make_EngineAssemble_Turbine.description: assemble a turbine engine, which is powered by gas expansion driving turbine blades, but fuel consumption is quite high. widely used in pre-spacer world jets and military vehicles..
LanguageData.DisassembleEngine.label: disassemble engine
LanguageData.DisassembleEngine.description: disassemble an engine into components. some part might break during to process so it can not full-recycled.
LanguageData.ExtractMetalFromEngine.label: extract metal from engine
LanguageData.ExtractMetalFromEngine.description: disassemble an engine into components. some part might break during to process so it can not full-recycled.
LanguageData.CastFromMold.label: make heavy compoment
LanguageData.CastFromMold.description: Use melted steel to make heavy compoment.
LanguageData.ExtractMetalFromCasting.label: extract metal from heavy compoment
LanguageData.ExtractMetalFromCasting.description: Use heat and strong electromagnets to recycle useful metal from heavy compoment.
LanguageData.CastFromMold.label: make casting from mold
LanguageData.CastFromMold.description: Use casting mold and melted steel to make heavy castings.
LanguageData.ExtractMetalFromCasting.label: extract metal from casting
LanguageData.ExtractMetalFromCasting.description: Use heat and strong electromagnets to recycle useful metal from castings.
